title: @Riot Twitch splash art update coming when?
body:
Last I heard, it was confirmed that Twitch was next on the splash art update list. We've since had a couple sneaky Vlad splash arts make their way to live, despite Twitch supposedly being next in line; so my question is, when can we expect the Twitch splash art changes to come? 
I mean, look at these!

http://i.imgur.com/Q2lIMDK.jpg
https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-27lw9hRunws/VwQKFlA9DKI/AAAAAAAANAw/dE8y6QD7GsMjMYnnDhxshGqjyCr3ug91g/s1600/Twitch_Splash_2.jpg
http://i.imgur.com/vmqErU6.jpg

And need I remind us that these _weren't_ the originals...

replies.body: SOON (tm)

That better mean tomorrow and not a trademark.
please? pretty please!?
I just want the eyepatch twitch to not look like a joke in the loading screen.
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
Lol, its not tomorrow
Tuesday morning confirmed?
fml
I had a question regarding Haunted Maokai, is it getting a new splash art along with his other skins?
He will

Are you guys sure it's necessary? I mean, it's not very outdated at all, IMO.

Hell, I'd argue Rocket Girl Tristana was more outdated, yet you didn't give her splash a complete 'overhaul' (if that's what you mean by "new splash art").
In fact, Rocket Girl Tristana's splash still doesn't look very similar to her updated in-game model, even with the redone ears.

Please reconsider. I feel like not only those art resources could go elsewhere, for the better, but also that it's a lovely splash as is, even if it was made in late 2012 (which was also the time when you guys really started upping your splash art quality).
The quality might indeed not be the best nowadays, but the splash matches almost perfectly with the model (if you consider the perspective in which Maokai is illustrated in), aside from his big hand probably (which, with his VU, is now a face with swirly runes/marks on the fingers rather than the big crack it was before).

######Don't take my arguments regarding Rocket Girl Trist's splash the wrong way though. I understand the decision behind not giving that skin a new splash, due to the constraints and limited resources, and I appreciate the effort in at least updating those ears to match with her updated silhouette.

Whaaat, really?
It actually looks really good.. Isn't it considered a relatively new one? (In comparison to his other splash arts)
It's decent but doesn't actually hold up to their quality standards as you can see when comparing it to his base, the base has a lot better look to it.
Karthus?
Karthus is on the list
Are Warwick's splashes being done at the same time at Twitch's?
Pretty sure they're planning new splashes for his rework, rather than new ones for now that will not fit his rework when it is done
Warwick's rework is being done already, and they want to finish it before the end of the year. Of course i mean the splashes done for his rework. xD
I can now sleep knowing my splash arts won't be blinding forever ;)
Really hoping you make the new Gangster Twitch splash like his old American one. I loved how he was grabbing onto a car and just shooting wildly with a maniacal look on his face.
Kingpin twitch isn't there?
Believe it or not: but the top one is Kingpin. That's how much these splash arts need a change. They barely even look like the in-game models ^^

Chinese splash swapped?
I remember my friend getting the mystery skin for it, and the splash being a recolor of twitch's original splash.
Kingpin used to look like this yes http://www.leagueoflegendsskins.com/images/champions/splash/Twitch_1.jpg but they did swap it out recently.

That's the sad part lol :) Terrible splash art "reworked" into slightly less terrible, but still pretty bad splash art. 

Please no offense splash art team; like 95% of your work is amazing <3
soon(tm)

You forgot http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Twitch_5.jpg and  http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Twitch_3.jpg HOW COULD YOU! XD

Besides, they only said it was a possibility to see him next as they are also working Warwick's relaunch in which he has ton of skins that need new splashes.  SO he might come before WW but might not.

Don't worry; I didn't forget them. Personally those splash arts are actually pretty decent looking.
As for the timing of Twitch's splash release; I do recall Riot confirmation that Twitch **was** next on the list. They may have also said before WW, but I at least remember them specifying Twitch being next.

DECENT?! Go away xD

Well he is one of the next ones, but the release is "WHEN" as they said it may be before or after Warwick. So we might not see them till early next year since that's most likely when WW will be released.

> DECENT?! Go away xD

Hey... look up at the top of my post again and tell me they aren't decent... ;)

As for release time, guess you might be right on them being released after ww (hope to god not...) but I found the post I was referring to [here](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4wbr7i/new_splash_arts_for_fiora_and_twitch_coming_soon/) and assuming that was 2 months ago, the Fiora splash's are out and some sneaky Vlad ones slipped through... I _hope_ for the best :/
Whistler Village, Kingpin, Medieval. Gangster and Vandal are getting new splashes
